org.daisy.dotify.devtools.jvm

Class ProcessStarter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.devtools.jvm.ProcessStarter

  • public class ProcessStarter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an easy way to start separate JVM instances.

      • startProcess

        public int startProcess(java.lang.String... command)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts a process synchronously with the supplied command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command, e.g. java -jar path/to/jar
        Returns:
        returns the return value of the process
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an IO-problem
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the process is interrupted
